original_title: The Recycled Spirits of Roel Cabato
overview: Roel Cabato, a Baguio-based Ilocano-Ifugao artist-environmentalist who creates artwork from rummaged materials and showcases them in his home and art space, Hananâ€™chi. Through his creations, he conveys his spiritual connection with his Ifugao background, as well as his campaign for environmentalism and recycling.
title: The Recycled Spirits of Roel Cabato
